title: Alan Sanders Archives - St. Peter's Health Partners News
cleaned_text: Alan Sanders, M.D., chief medical officer for St. Peter's Health Partners Acute Care, discusses the latest information on COVID-19 vaccines, including side effects and efficacy rates, in a podcast with WTEN's Trishna Begam. [[...]](https://news.sphp.com/in-the-news/wten-podcast-vaccine-q-a-with-dr-alan-sanders/) Spectrum News interviewed Alan Sanders, M.D., chief medical officer for St. Peter's Health Partners Acute Care, about some common concerns surrounding the COVID-19 vaccines.
